document_data.mainbody:
erelis Greenleaf was a ranger in the Quivering Forest near Phlan in 1489 DR.
Serelis usually acted as a mediator between the Kabels Hills community and the elves of the forest.
Serelis lived in the Quivering Forest near Kabels Hill. He was possibly involved in the case of the disappearance of Halvin Graingle and six other villagers inside the forest when an adventuring party went to ask for his help.
